Articles.Content:
Hey guys and girls.

How are we all today? I'm alright, just been playing this awesome game for about 2 weeks now and still getting the hang of it! So a little bit of an introduction. My name is Pete, I come from Victoria, Australia. I am very much into games such as GTA4, Minecraft and obviously KSP! Look forward to having a heap of fun on this forum with you all!

From Pete!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy exploding!!!

[impersonates skunkmonkey]

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy exploding!!!

[impersonates skunkmonkey]

You know, impersonating a mod is a bannable offense, right? ;P

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

You know, impersonating a mod is a bannable offense, right? ;P

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

yeah, But it don't say 'MODERATOR' under my name so how could I possibly be a Mod?

Onya Pete!

(Throws Pete the coldie of his choice)
